description:
While producing your video, in the video rendering step, you will find two privacy options:

  • Public
  • Private
You can also see a third option called 'Unlisted' when you explore the 'Info&Details' option under 'Video Settings' section on the video player page.


Making a video PUBLIC means anyone can watch your videos, UNLISTED means that only people with the link to the video can view your video and PRIVATE means only you can view your video.

Thus, according to the privacy settings that you have set for your video, others will be able to watch your video.
title: Can anyone else watch my videos?
description_text:
While producing your video, in the video rendering step, you will find two privacy options:  
 Public 
 Private 
  You can also see a third option called 'Unlisted' when you explore the 'Info&Details' option under 'Video Settings' section on the video player page.     Making a video PUBLIC means anyone can watch your videos, UNLISTED means that only people with the link to the video can view your video and PRIVATE means only you can view your video.     Thus, according to the privacy settings that you have set for your video, others will be able to watch your video.

description: You can view as well as download the existing videos saved in 'My Videos' even after your subscription expires. However, you can't edit the videos created with premium and pro styles because editing video is equivalent to starting a whole new video project.
title: What happens to my videos after my paid subscription expires?
description_text: You can view as well as download the existing videos saved in 'My Videos' even after your subscription expires. However, you can't edit the videos created with premium and pro styles because editing video is equivalent to starting a whole new video project.

description:
It should only take a few minutes to process a video. But at times, it may take longer depending upon the style you choose due to heavy animation in it.


However, if it takes longer than 5 minutes to produce, there might be an error. At such circumstance, we recommend you to cancel the processing and restart the process.
title: How long should my video take to produce?
description_text:
It should only take a few minutes to process a video. But at times, it may take longer depending upon the style you choose due to heavy animation in it. 
   
 However, if it takes longer than 5 minutes to produce, there might be an error. At such circumstance, we recommend you to cancel the processing and restart the process.

description:
You get to choose your video resolution in the 'Finalize' step while producing your video. We currently serve 360p (SD), 480p,720p (HD) and 1080p (FHD). On the web platform, only 360p is free and others are available to paid subscribers only. 


If you have a standard account and want to increase your video resolution to Full HD, you'd like to upgrade your account into premium or pro. Here's how:


How to upgrade your account?

  1. Log in to your Picovico account.
  2. Go to Upgrade, on the navigation menu.
  3. Select a feasible plan and start with a 3 day free trial.
  4. Click on Buy and enter the card details. (Your card will not be charged for 3 days. During this time, you can choose to end trial & start subscription or cancel the subscription.)
  5. Enjoy your videos in high definition.

Once your account is upgraded, you can choose the resolution you'd like (480p, 720p, 1080p) and create an HD video.
title: How do I increase the resolution of my video to HD?
description_text:
You get to choose your video resolution in the 'Finalize' step while producing your video. We currently serve 360p (SD), 480p,720p (HD) and 1080p (FHD). On the web platform, only 360p is free and others are available to paid subscribers only.  
   
 If you have a standard account and want to increase your video resolution to Full HD, you'd like to upgrade your account into premium or pro. Here's how: 
   
 How to upgrade your account? 
 
 
Log in to your Picovico account. 
 Go to Upgrade, on the navigation menu. 
 Select a feasible plan and start with a 3 day free trial. 
 Click on Buy and enter the card details. (Your card will not be charged for 3 days. During this time, you can choose to end trial & start subscription or cancel the subscription.)
 
 Enjoy your videos in high definition. 
 
   
 Once your account is upgraded, you can choose the resolution you'd like (480p, 720p, 1080p) and create an HD video.

description: Videos made with a Pro account do not have any watermark or Picovico logo unlike ones made with Premium/ Standard account.
title: Do videos have a Picovico watermark?
description_text: Videos made with a Pro account do not have any watermark or Picovico logo unlike ones made with Premium/ Standard account.
